Text.Page:
The {@LinkCreature:20#30011100#morale boosters} keep the slaves working; so get rid of them and the digging should stop.

Once you've taken care of them, head to the Reliquary Station in the Halls of Shadow. They've been asking for reinforcements.

You might find that you're bounced around a bit in here.

Finally! It's good to see they haven't forgotten about us completely.

I hope you don't need to rest, because there's no time for that.
